entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 3:27 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNE 47 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
